block.createnuclear.reactor_input.toolti: _The Reactor Input_ is a _block_ that can be used to insert _Uranium_ and _Graphene_ rods into the _Reactor_
Insert _uranium_ and _graphene_ rods in large quantities to power _the reactor_
block.createnuclear.reactor_controller.t: The _Reactor Controller_ is the _most important_ block for operating the reactor
it handles all the calculations needed to _generate energy_, it need a _reactor blueprint_ with a pattern to work
block.createnuclear.reactor_output.toolt: _The Reactor Output_ is a _block_ that can be used to extract the mechanical energy generated by the _Reactor_
You can _extract the energy_ produce by the reactor by attaching _shaft_ to the _reactor output_
_Stick_ to be used in the _reactor input_ to operate it.
item.createnuclear.uranium_rod.tooltip.s: _Stick_ to be used in the _reactor input_ to operate it.
item.createnuclear.reactor_blueprint_ite: It allows you to configure your own pattern.
Filled with graphite and uranium rods
_Right_ click on the reactor controller to open it.
block.createnuclear.enriched_soul_soil.t: The _only_ block who create _enriched fire_.Can be used to _craft_ enriched campfire or just to make a _green fire_.
